sections.title: Comfortable Dining
sections.text: Whether you're dining with family or friends, PASTI provides a friendly atmosphere where good food and great conversations come together. A perfect place to enjoy authentic Sri Lankan flavors.

sections.title: Loved by Locals & Travelers
sections.text: From Mahiyanganaya locals to foreign visitors, PASTI is known for tasty food, friendly service, and a calm place to enjoy your meal.

sections.title: Cozy Interior
sections.text: Designed for comfort and relaxation, our interior offers a warm and welcoming space for families, friends, and casual dining. Every detail is carefully arranged to create a pleasant dining experience.

sections.title: A Calm Place to Eat & Relax
sections.text: Whether you live nearby or are visiting Mahiyanganaya, PASTI is a comfortable place to eat, relax, and enjoy good food.
